metadata.title: CVE-2017-16921 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In OTRS 6.0.x up to and including 6.0.1, OTRS 5.0.x up to and including5.0.24, and OTRS 4.0.x up to and including 4.0.26, an attacker who islogged into OTRS as an agent can manipulate form parameters (related toPGP) and execute arbitrary shell commands with the permissions of the OTRSor web server user.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
